mapper.insert: insert into shop (shop_name, price, stock,description, img) values (#{shopDTO.name}, #{shopDTO.price}, #{shopDTO.stock},#{shopDTO.description}, #{imgUrl})
mapper.update: update shop set stock = stock - 1 where id = #{id} and stock > 0 and status=1
update shop set stock = stock - 1,version=version+1 where id = #{id} and stock > 0 and status = 1 and version= #{version}
